text: The space from the gutter on the ground to the lower ledge shall be two cubits, and the ledge one cubit wide.43:14 The space was to be approximately 3.5 feet (1.1 meters), and the ledge was to be approximately 1.75 feet wide (53.3 centimeters wide). The space from the smaller ledge to the larger ledge shall be four cubits, and the ledge one cubit wide.43:14 The space was to be approximately 7 feet (2.1 meters), and the ledge was to be approximately 1.75 feet wide (53.3 centimeters wide).
